a.title: COVID Information Page
a.span: Park#16 COVID-19 / Online Learning Information Page

br.p: Meeteetse Schools, in partnership with home and community, provides consistent individualized instruction that drives high student achievement and cultivates the development of the whole child.

div.p: Meeteetse Schools will set the standard for educational achievement as we challenge our students with an uncompromising commitment to excellence as: respectful individuals, independent thinkers, lifelong learners and tomorrow's leaders.
